headline: Generally Intelligent (YC S17) Is Hiring Machine Learning Research Engineers
description:
Generally Intelligent is an AI research company. Our mission is to build human-like general intelligence and make it safely accessible in order to ensure that the transition to greater-than-human intelligence leads to a more abundant, unconstrained, and equitable society. We take a first-principles approach, starting from simple self-supervised architectures and evolving them to tackle human developmental milestones of increasing complexity.

Machine Learning Research Engineer role (onsite in San Francisco only): https://jobs.lever.co/generallyintelligent/c2f4a435-1eef-489...

If you don’t have ML experience or you are remote, see the Systems Engineer role: https://jobs.lever.co/generallyintelligent/7afede07-8f22-4c4...

Our YC jobs page is here: https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/generally-intelligent
headline_zh-Hans: 通用智能（YC S17）正在招聘机器学习研究工程师
headline_zh-Hant: 通用智能（YC S17）正在招聘機器學習研究工程師
description_zh-Hans:
一般来说，智能公司是一家人工智能研究公司。我们的使命是建立类似人类的通用智能，并使其安全地获得，以确保向比人类更高的智能过渡，导致一个更丰富、不受约束和公平的社会。我们采取第一原理的方法，从简单的自我监督架构开始，并不断发展，以解决人类发展中日益复杂的里程碑。

机器学习研究工程师的角色（仅在旧金山现场）。https://jobs.lever.co/generallyintelligent/c2f4a435-1eef-489...

If you don’t have ML experience or you are remote, see the Systems Engineer role: https://jobs.lever.co/generallyintelligent/7afede07-8f22-4c4...

Our YC jobs page is here: https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/generally-intelligent
description_zh-Hant:
一般來說，智能公司是一家人工智能研究公司。我們的使命是建立類似人類的通用智能，並使其安全地獲得，以確保向比人類更高的智能過渡，導致一個更豐富、不受約束和公平的社會。我們採取第一原理的方法，從簡單的自我監督架構開始，並不斷髮展，以解決人類發展中日益複雜的里程碑。

機器學習研究工程師的角色（僅在舊金山現場）。https://jobs.lever.co/generallyintelligent/c2f4a435-1eef-489...

If you don’t have ML experience or you are remote, see the Systems Engineer role: https://jobs.lever.co/generallyintelligent/7afede07-8f22-4c4...

Our YC jobs page is here: https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/generally-intelligent
